job.title: Site Reliability Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <br><br><strong>Our History:<br><br></strong>From our start in 2009, Conexess has established itself in 3 markets, employing nearly 200+ individuals nation-wide. Operating in over 15 states, our client base ranges from Fortune 500/1000 companies to mid-small range companies. For the majority of the mid-small range companies, we are exclusively used due to our outstanding staffing track record<br><br><strong><u>Who We Are<br><br></u></strong>Conexess is a full-service staffing firm offering contract, contract-to hire, and direct placements. We have a wide range of recruiting capabilities extending from help desk technicians to CIOs. We are also capable of offering project-based work.<br><br><strong>Conexess Group is aiding a large healthcare client in their search for a Site Reliability Engineer in a remote capacity.</strong> This is a long-term opportunity with a competitive compensation package.<br><br>******We are unable to work C2C on this role******<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Manage and monitor production systems</li> <li>Monitor application Availability &amp; performance issues</li> <li>Communicate data and integration issues </li> <li>Work with stakeholders to identify &amp; define the service level indicators and objectives</li> <li>Work with the service delivery teams in developing and testing automation of repetitive and manual efforts</li> <li>Work closely with engineering teams on monitoring and performance management tools initiatives to improve system reliability and performance</li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Desired Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul> <li>5+ years of experience in Developer, Operations roles</li> <li>4+ years of SRE experience</li> <li>3+ years of public cloud experience</li> <li>Experience with monitoring and observability systems like Dynatrace, CA APM, Splunk etc.</li> <li>Hands on experiences in AWS technologies – Cloud Watch, Step Functions, Lambda, Glue, EC2, Redshift, DynamoDB, SQS, ECS/EKS, Elastic Search, SnowFlake, Elastic Cache, databricks, to name a few</li> <li>Experiences with additional enterprise technologies: OpenShift, Kafka, Redhat, DataBricks</li> <li>Exposure to standard software development practices including agile, deployment pipelines, continuous integrations and continuous delivery</li> <li>Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvements</li> <li>Experience in one or more programming languages Python, Java, Scala, PySpark</li> <li>Experience with build and deployment pipeline technologies like Jenkins, Cloudbees, Terraform, Urban Code Deploy, Ansible, Maven, GitHub</li></ul>
